channel.title: RuneScape 2001
channel.description: Did anyone start playing around 2001, and also did anyone do the xmas event? :)

item.title: RuneScape 2001
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:14, topic:402214”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=499265.msg3652932#msg3652932 date=1309843520]

You say christmas event like there was one in classic. Collecting items off the ground isn’t really considered an event.
[/quote]It’s funny because despite the simplicity, it was 500x better than the bullshit we have today.

So true, i keep posting on forums for them to re open classic because i fucking hate rs now.

They do reopen classic ???

They did once, the idea since then has been scrapped.

Its happened 2 or 3 times. It happens every 6 months I think

Then why can I still play classic? :S[/quote]

Because you have played it before. i havent on this account. On my old account i can play classic but that got hacked

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 2001
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4

[quote=“Speljohan, post:6, topic:402214”][quote author=Jerico Pimpinbro link=topic=499265.msg3651259#msg3651259 date=1309746342]

item.title: RuneScape 2001
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:6, topic:402214”][quote author=Jerico Pimpinbro link=topic=499265.msg3651259#msg3651259 date=1309746342]
You say christmas event like there was one in classic. Collecting items off the ground isn’t really considered an event.
[/quote]It’s funny because despite the simplicity, it was 500x better than the bullshit we have today.[/quote]

Even though i agree, you have to remember, Jagex has to update there content to stay caught up with all the other games.

Personally i feel for Jagex. Even though i agree rs was alot better awhile back, if they didnt update there content then everyone would look it as an old game, and Jagex wouldnt have half there audience.

So look at it this way, if they kept there old content people would complain that the game looks terrible compared to other games these days, and when they do update there are complaints. There just trying to help us and make the game better, with every update its there goal, but we all whine and complain about it all the time. Its a loose loose situation for them trying to make us have fun…

Read full topic
